textTemplates.name: Fill_Partner_Information_Tmp
textTemplates.text: Please fill in partner information.

textTemplates.name: How_Heard_Error_Message_Tmp
textTemplates.text: Please enter the value.

textTemplates.name: Not_Valid_Email_Message_Tmp
textTemplates.text: Please provide a valid email address.

textTemplates.name: PreferredPhone_HomeError_Tmp
textTemplates.text: You've selected home phone as preferred phone. Please enter the value.

textTemplates.name: PreferredPhone_MobileError_Tmp
textTemplates.text: You've selected mobile phone as preferred phone. Please enter the value.

textTemplates.description: We will use this to check typed the phone number. "The phone number must consist only of the digits [0-9]."
textTemplates.name: RegExp_Number_Error_Validation_Message_Tmp
textTemplates.text: The phone number must consist only of the digits [0-9] and not more than {!PREFERRED_PHONE_MAX_LENGTH} numbers.

textTemplates.name: Under18_Years_Old_Text_Tmp
textTemplates.text: Please ONLY tick here if you or your birthing partner will be under 18 years old at the start of the course 02 June 2020.

textTemplates.name: Who_Will_Be_Coming_With_You_Text_Tmp
textTemplates.text: Who will be coming on the course with you?
